mapper.select: select SubInStep_no, SubjectName from v_subject where Step_no in (select Step_no from StepInPack where Package_no=(select Package_no from Curriculum where Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no}))
select s.Score_no from Score s, SubInStep sis where s.SubInStep_no=sis.SubInStep_no and sis.SubInStep_no=#{sis_no}

select.if: select u.User_no, u.NameHan from Users u, ApplyInfo a where a.User_no=u.User_no and a.Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no} and a.State='비트생'

select u.User_no, u.NameHan, s.Score, s.Score_no, ifnull(s.File_no,0) as File_no, if(isnull(f.FileName),'등록된 파일이 없습니다.', CONCAT('등록된 파일 : ',f.FileName)) as FileName from Users u join ApplyInfo a on u.User_no = a.User_no and a.Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no} and a.State='비트생' join Score s on s.SubInStep_no=#{subInStep_no} and u.User_no=s.User_no join SubInStep sis on s.SubInStep_no = sis.SubInStep_no left join File f on s.File_no = f.File_no;

insert.if: insert into Score(Curriculum_no, SubInStep_no, User_no, Score) values (#{curriculum_no}, #{subInStep_no}, #{user_no}, #{score})
insert into Score(Curriculum_no, SubInStep_no, User_no, Score, File_no) values (#{curriculum_no}, #{subInStep_no}, #{user_no}, #{score}, #{file_no})

insert into File(File_no, FileSize, FilePath, FileName) values (#{file_no},#{fileSize},#{filePath},#{fileName})
